body:
Hey Avicus, Im here on a serious note to explain my behavior lately.

As most of you have noticed, Ive become more and more inactive for the past couple of months, and here are the reasons why.

1- Ive been playing lots of Call of Duty black ops 2 lately, even though I suck its very fun. Ive become addicted to that game and as a result Im playing a lot less Minecraft in general.

2- My computer is starting to bluescreen and that stuff, so my PC is almost unplayable now (20 fps) and I really hate bad FPS. Im going to get a new PC anyways when summer starts, so expect to see lots of me eating people and making the void eat them! lol

3- Exam time is starting, so I need to study hard. I hate school too mates but good grades have always been a priority for me =l.

4- Ive been losing interest in Minecraft in general, but Ik its because of me not playing much cuz I still watch the vids xD.

Lastly, Im going to underline the horrible sportsmanship Ive had over the past 6 MONTHS. I have excuses for every death, and when Its fair I rage A LOT. Ive came to a conclusion that Im overall not a good person and that I want to be a better sport. So please, when you see me rage or whatnot, refer to this topic, and hopefully ill stop harassing you guys :3.

Thanks for reading, heres a puppy :3 with a cookie.https://www.google.ca/search?q=puppy+with+cookie&rlz=1C1NWPB_en&es_sm=122&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&...

title: Why Im so inactive and an apology

replies.body: It's all good dude, we all have our share of bad moments :-) good luck in school!
